Table of Contents

Name

binsnap - convert binary files to snapshot

Synopsis

binsnap [parameter=value]

Description

This program is still hardcoded to deal with one particular example, but is intended to become more programmable,much like tabtos(1NEMO) .

Parameters

The following parameters are recognized in any order if the keyword is also given:
in=
Input rvc file [???]
out=
Output snapshot file [???]
nbody=
Number of bodies [0]
body=
Body variables [pos,vel,den,Tr,Tg,l]
type=
Types (double,float,int,short,1,2,4,8) [ddddddddds]
mscale=
Scale densities by [1e-21]
pscale=
Scale position by [1e17]
vscale=
Scale velocities by [1e5]
dr=
Cell size for level=0 [1.448e16]
mass=
Use density (f) or mass (t) [t]
headline=
Random verbiage []

Examples

See Also

qbinsnap(1NEMO) , snapshot(5NEMO)

Files

Author

Peter Teuben
